## Objectives

> Some people, when confronted with a problem, think: “I know, I’ll use regular expressions.” Now they have two problems.
— Jamie Zawinski


At the end of the first part of this lesson, learners will:

1. Demonstrate the ability to load data files in a variety of formats into an R environment; and 

1. Understand fundamental elements of regular expressions, and where to find additional resources to help create regular expressions.


At the end of the second part of this lesson, learners will:

1. Understand the underlying structure of a webpage; and  

1. Webscraping: demonstrate how to read data stored in a webpage into an R environment.
